netCoin 1.2.20

igraph object.

toIgraph.Rd

igraph object from a netCoin object.

toIgraph(net)

Arguments

net

is a netCoin object. See netCoin

Value

An igraph object.

Author

Modesto Escobar, Department of Sociology and Communication, University of Salamanca. See https://sociocav.usal.es/blog/modesto-escobar/

Examples

# A character column (with separator)
frame <- data.frame(A = c("Man; Women", "Women; Women",
                        "Man; Man", "Undet.; Women; Man"))
data <- dichotomize(frame, "A", sep="; ")[2:4]
C <- coin(data) # coincidence matrix
N <- asNodes(C) # node data frame
E <- edgeList(C) # edge data frame
net <- netCoin(N, E) # netCoin object
toIgraph(net) # conversion into a igraph object

#> IGRAPH 7c306bc UN-- 3 2 -- 
#> + attr: name (v/c), frequency (v/n), label (v/c), Haberman (e/n), p(Z)
#> | (e/n)
#> + edges from 7c306bc (vertex names):
#> [1] Man  --Undet. Women--Undet.
